page.title: 17THE YOUTH CLUB
page.content: One year ago, a youth club was started in Catterline. It has two snooker tables and one Atari which plays Van-Guard and Pac-Man. Atari is a game which is played through a television. We have table tennis and now after a year's hard work of fund raising, we have raised enough money to buy extra equipment, which includes- another Atari, a dartboard and darts and swingball. We raised the money doing sponsored walks which means that people promise to give you money for every mile that you walk. We raised Â£310.00 on the first walk and Â£350.00 on the second walk. We have three football teams including a girls' team. We go to Mackie Academy to play Unihok and also to swim. Mackie Academy is the secondary school that Catterline pupils go to when they are about eleven years old.
